description: Change of use of 1st and 2nd floors from Retails (Class E(a)) to 2no.x Residential flats (Class C3).
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated through the submission of cogent evidence that the occupiers of the proposed dwellings would not be subject to unacceptable levels of noise from commercial premises, contrary to Condition G.1 (d) (iii) of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class G of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed arrangements for the storage and management of domestic waste would be fit for purpose, contrary to  Condition G.1 (d) (v) of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class G of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

It has not been demonstrated that the minimum floor to ceiling height would be at least 2.3m for at least 75% of the Gross Internal Areas of the proposed flat, contrary to Article 3, 9A(b) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)
